reviewText: So, I thought this would be a good thing to see because I've been reading up on British potters (historically like Michael Cardew, Bernard Leach - and current Like Phil Rogers).  This DVD is best left alone.  Invest in Robin Hopper's DVD's instead.  The one thing I took out of this was the simple forms and each of movement of this potter.  He is good but the content isn't all the exciting.
